item.description:
The squirrels are gathering their acorns & soon our pups will be romping around in piles of pretty colored leaves. What better time to welcome the beginning of autumn, visit with old friends and make some new ones too! Sunday September 23, 2012 from 1:00pm - 3:00
Pooches will have Fun with silly games like Apple "Picking", and can wrestle and play chase with friends. We can't wait to hear what you have all been up to. See you Soon!

Dog Friendly Dogs only Please!

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Fall Harvest Fun
